vision_analysis.exact_question_text: What are the main reason/s you chose this outlet for this particular occasion?
clickable_elements: Easy to take away / eat on the go
Was already drinking / socialising there (food was secondary)
I specifically wanted / had craving for that type of food
Chosen due to seating, atmosphere or location (food was secondary)
Someone else decided / person I was with decided

automation.question_text:
Your 2nd most recent LUNCH which was EATEN AT RESTAURANT / CAFÉ / FOOD OUTLET.

What are the main reason/s you chose this outlet for this particular occasion?
response_values: beach side cafe at resort we were staying at
